name: Advantage: Yui! Taikou Space Force
description:
'Taikou Space Force' is a one-stage demo starring a young team of pilots offering a slightly tongue-in-cheek homage to titles like 'Gradius' in a small shoot 'em up engine built in Pixel Game Maker MV.

In this prototype, players can choose between three different pilots (one of which is not fully completed) and fly through a single stage, shooting basic enemies and collecting power-ups. 2-player multiplayer is even available! Gameplay ends upon appearance of a boss ship.

(For easy access, the tutorial may be skipped with the Start button)
